While I love the game mechanics themselves, I simply can't recommend Dead by Daylight. There are several paywall tactics, like giving you half of an outfit for an event, and charging to unlock the other half. On top of this the servers are notoriously buggy. Even a brief search will show years of connection errors, and the infamous verification bug which happens virtually every single patch now. If you can ignore these somewhat small bugs, DBD itself is a delightfully tactical cat and mouse game. With a variety of modifiers to change up how your character plays. And a very high skill cap on the gameplay, with it's own ranking system.
it is good game to play for scares and general entertainment
